title: Todd: There has been a concerted effort to discredit media
itunes:title: Todd: There has been a concerted effort to discredit media
description:
NBC's Chuck Todd weighs in on Donald Trump, his press ban and immigration ban on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.
